Amalgamation of Aditya Birla Finance Ltd.:Aditya Birla Capital completed the amalgamation of its wholly owned subsidiary, Aditya Birla Finance Ltd., with itself, effective April 1, 2025. This created a large, unified operating NBFC.

Leadership Changes:Vishakha Mulye was appointed as MD & CEO, and Rakesh Singh as Executive Director & CEO (NBFC). Additionally, Deep Pal Singh was appointed as the Chief Risk Officer, effective April 1, 2025.

New Products/Services:Aditya Birla Capital Digital Limited launched Digital Gold SIP in April 2025.

Fundraising:The company successfully completed a fundraise of â‚¹3,000 Crores.

Q4 and FY25 Results:Aditya Birla Capital announced its Q4FY25 and FY25 results on May 12, 2025.

Postal Ballot Resolutions (June 20, 2025):Members approved the appointment of Nagesh Pinge and Sunil Srivastav as Independent Directors, effective April 1, 2025.

New Borrowing Limits (May 21, 2025):The company announced an increase in borrowing limits and the issuance of Non-Convertible Debentures on a private placement basis.
